localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 🧠 Search a video *semantically* with OpenAI's CLIP neural network. ❓ Example: Which frame has a person with sunglasses and earphones? 🔍 Try searching with text, image, or text + image. 👇 Thread https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1244260281632481280 https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1383411082853683208
blogPost.body: 🧠 Search a video *semantically* with OpenAI's CLIP neural network. ❓ Example: Which frame has a person with sunglasses and earphones? 🔍 Try searching with text, image, or text + image. 👇 Thread https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1244260281632481280 https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1383411082853683208
blogPost.title: Which Frame? - Search a video with AI magic. Which frame has X?
blogPost.author: David Chuan-en Lin

localize.description: 🧠 OpenAIのCLIPニューラルネットワークで、動画を *semantically* 検索します。❓例です。サングラスとイヤホンをした人が映っているフレームは？🔍 テキスト、画像、テキスト＋画像で検索してみてください。👇 Thread https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1244260281632481280 https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1383411082853683208
localize.tagline: AIマジックで動画を検索。どのフレームにXがあるか？

localize.description: 🧠用OpenAI的CLIP神经网络搜索一个视频*符号。❓ 举个例子。哪一帧有一个戴墨镜和耳机的人？🔍 尝试用文本、图像或文本+图像搜索。👇 Thread https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1244260281632481280 https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1383411082853683208
localize.tagline: 用AI魔法搜索一段视频。哪一帧有X？

localize.description: 🧠用OpenAI的CLIP神經網絡搜索一個視頻*符號。❓ 舉個例子。哪一幀有一個戴墨鏡和耳機的人？🔍 嘗試用文本、圖像或文本+圖像搜索。👇 Thread https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1244260281632481280 https://twitter.com/chuanenlin/status/1383411082853683208
localize.tagline: 用AI魔法搜索一段視頻。哪一幀有X？
